title: Sidecar HTTP server starts and responds to health checks
description: Verify the sidecar process starts correctly, signals READY, and responds to health endpoints

steps.action: Start the browser sidecar process (node dist/browser/browser-sidecar.js --port 3849)
steps.expected: Process starts and prints READY to stdout within 10 seconds
Returns 200 with JSON body including status: 'ok' and session info (null if no active session)

steps.action: Send GET /session/status with no active session
steps.expected: Returns 200 with JSON body indicating no active session

steps.action: Send GET /session/screenshot with no active session
Send SIGTERM to the sidecar process
steps.expected: Process shuts down cleanly within 5 seconds
